title: $:/plugins/skeeve/action-increment
description: An actionWidget to increment a value
author: Skeeve
readme:
! Introduction

The ''action-increment'' widget is an [[action widget|https://tiddlywiki.com/#ActionWidgets]] that retrieves a value from a text reference. It will then increase the first digit-sequence found in that text and store it.

For more information, please see the online documentation.

{{Online Documentation#action-increment Plugin||$:/plugins/skeeve/documentation/documentation}}

title: $:/plugins/skeeve/documentation
description: Plugin required by my other plugins. Used for documentation.
author: Skeeve
readme:
The ''documentation'' plugin contains tiddlers used by my other plugins.

Do not use the documentation tiddlers in production code as I might change them without notice.

title: $:/plugins/skeeve/pick
description: An collection of filters and widgets to pick out text by using rgular expressions
author: Skeeve
